    • Constructor Detail

      • Yatzy

        public Yatzy()

    • Method Detail

      • getValues

        public int[] getValues()
        Returns the 5 face values of the dice.

      • getThrowCount

        public int getThrowCount()
        Returns the number of times the 5 dice has been thrown.

      • resetThrowCount

        public void resetThrowCount()
        Resets the throw count.

      • throwDice

        public void throwDice(boolean[] holds)
        Rolls the 5 dice. Only roll dice that are not hold. Pre: holds contain 5 boolean values.

      • getResults

        public int[] getResults()
        Returns all results possible with the current face values. The order of the results is the same as on the score board. Note: This is an optional method. Comment this method out, if you don't want use it.

      • sameValuePoints

        public int sameValuePoints(int value)
        Returns same-value points for the given face value. Returns 0, if no dice has the given face value. Pre: 1 <= value <= 6;

      • onePairPoints

        public int onePairPoints()
        Returns points for one pair (for the face value giving highest points). Returns 0, if there aren't 2 dice with the same face value.

      • twoPairPoints

        public int twoPairPoints()
        Returns points for two pairs (for the 2 face values giving highest points). Returns 0, if there aren't 2 dice with one face value and 2 dice with a different face value.

      • threeSamePoints

        public int threeSamePoints()
        Returns points for 3 of a kind. Returns 0, if there aren't 3 dice with the same face value.

      • fourSamePoints

        public int fourSamePoints()
        Returns points for 4 of a kind. Returns 0, if there aren't 4 dice with the same face value.

      • fullHousePoints

        public int fullHousePoints()
        Returns points for full house. Returns 0, if there aren't 3 dice with one face value and 2 dice a different face value.

      • smallStraightPoints

        public int smallStraightPoints()
        Returns points for small straight. Returns 0, if the dice are not showing 1,2,3,4,5.

      • largeStraightPoints

        public int largeStraightPoints()
        Returns points for large straight. Returns 0, if the dice is not showing 2,3,4,5,6.

      • chancePoints

        public int chancePoints()
        Returns points for chance.

      • yatzyPoints

        public int yatzyPoints()
        Returns points for yatzy. Returns 0, if there aren't 5 dice with the same face value.
